alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 2:33PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RAIN AND HIGH FREEZING LEVELS AFTER WINTER STORM COULD PROMPT NUISANCE FLOODING SUNDAY NIGHT INTO MONDAY... After a winter storm passes Sunday, precipitation changes to rain Sunday night. With a deep snow pack in many locations across the south central Inner Channels, nuisance flooding could develop in parts of the region. Otherwise, surface conditions will become very slippery. Unplowed areas will become difficult to pass. Heavy snow loads on roof- tops, boats, and idle aircraft will be challenged by the heavy rains for Sunday night into Monday. While nuisance flooding could occur, no flooding of rivers and streams is expected.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
